TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission

Docs.summary: Provides a permission structure that allows methods or classes to access configuration files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ConfigurationPermission class provides a permission structure that allows methods or classes to access configuration files. Also, ConfigurationPermission provides ways to resolve multiple permissions values through such methods as <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Union%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Intersect%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Copy() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> object with the same permission level.
Docs.returns: A new <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> with the same permission level.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void FromXml(class System.Security.SecurityElement securityElement) cil managed

Docs.param: The configuration element from which the permission state is read.
Docs.summary: Reads the value of the permission state from XML.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.param: The object containing the permissions to perform the intersection with.
Docs.summary: Returns the logical intersection between the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> object and a given object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
Docs.returns: The logical intersection between the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> and a given object that implements <xref:System.Security.IPermission>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Although the method signature accepts any object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception will be thrown if calling the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method on the object referenced by the parameter does not return <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.summary: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> object with an object implementing the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
Docs.returns: `true` if the permission state is equal; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Although the method signature accepts any object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception will be thrown if calling the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method on the object referenced by the parameter does not return <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName>.
If the object referenced by the parameter is `null`, the comparison is done between the permission state of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> object and the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> value of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the permission state for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> object is the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> value of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeration.
Docs.returns: `true` if the permission state for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> is the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> value of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement"> object with attribute values based on the current <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement"> with attribute values based on the current <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to perform the union with.
Docs.summary: Returns the logical union of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> object and an object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
Docs.returns: The logical union of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> and an object that implements <xref:System.Security.IPermission>.
